SELECT questionno, typeno, codingno, id, username, title, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate, hitcount, curious from (select rownum as rnum, T1.* from (select * from question order by curious desc) T1) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3

SELECT questionno, typeno, codingno, id, username, title, content, to_char(regdate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as regdate, hitcount, curious from (select rownum as rnum, T1.* from (select * from question where add_months(sysdate, -3) <= regdate order by curious desc) T1) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3

select T3.* from ( select rownum as rnum2, questionno, replyno, id, username, content, regdate, recommend from reply where questionno in ( select questionno from ( select rownum as rnum, T1.* from ( select * from reply order by recommend desc ) T1 ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3 ) and replyno in ( select replyno from ( select rownum as rnum3, T1.* from ( select * from reply order by recommend desc ) T1 ) where rnum3 >= 1 and rnum3 <= 3 ) ) T3 where rnum2 >= 1 and rnum2 <= 3 order by recommend desc

select T3.* from ( select rownum as rnum2, questionno, replyno, id, username, content, regdate, recommend from reply where questionno in ( select questionno from ( select rownum as rnum, T1.* from ( select * from reply where add_months(sysdate, -3) <= regdate order by recommend desc ) T1 ) where rnum >= 1 and rnum <= 3 ) and replyno in ( select replyno from ( select rownum as rnum3, T1.* from ( select * from reply where add_months(sysdate, -3) <= regdate order by recommend desc ) T1 ) where rnum3 >= 1 and rnum3 <= 3 ) ) T3 where rnum2 >= 1 and rnum2 <= 3 order by recommend desc
